def_cn: 有色眼镜，眼罩（比喻观点狭隘，不考虑他人的想法）
def_en: If you describe someone as wearing blinkers, you think that they have a narrow point of view and are not taking other people's opinions into account.

def_cn: （系于马眼旁使其只能直视的）马眼罩
def_en: Blinkers are two pieces of leather which are placed at the side of a horse's eyes so that it can only see straight ahead.
